greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} binomial(n,k)*binomial(2^k+n-1,n).
mathematica: Table[Sum[(-1)^(n-k) * StirlingS1[n, k]*(2^k + 1)^n, {k, 0, n}]/n!, {n, 0, 12}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 08 2019 *)
results.author: _Paul Hanna_ and _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 21 2008
